title: Smarter ways to fight with your partner
text:
Next Story : Indulge in luxurious oils with Lakme Salon

Fights are an inevitable part of a healthy relationship—after all, if you don’t put your point across and get heard, even if it is unpleasant to your partner, you will never build strong channels of communication in your relationship. However, incessant bickering can be very harmful for your bond. Here’s how to be smarter when you are at loggerheads with each other.Don’t nitpick about every little thing; choose to make an issue about things that really matter to you and the relationship. However, if you find that there are certain serious issues that your partner is unwilling to compromise on, that always ignite huge fights, then you would do better to let them be for the sake of peace and deal with them in other ways.If you find that the fight is escalating beyond control, then it would do you and your partner well to take some time to cool off. Remove yourself from the situation for a bit—go for a walk or to another room—till you are calmer. Experts say that it takes us about 40 minutes to truly get our equanimity back! However, don’t leave in a huff; tell your partner that you think it would be best for both of you to take a time-out.Have the grace to see the other person’s point of view and admit that you were wrong. It does not make you a smaller person. Holding on to grudges and being unwilling to compromise will make the fight fester and cause a deeper rift than it deserves.There’s no rule that says that you have to keep all your relationship stresses close to your chest. If you feel that you cannot handle a situation or if a cold war is going on for too long with your guy, then feel free to confide in a friend or family member and request them to mediate. They will not only be able to guide you but will also be able to provide a third person perspective in the issue at hand.
description: If you must fight with your partner, then do it intelligently. Here’s how you can be smarter when you have an argument with bae
